snippet: Encouraging news from government budget talks halted morning losses, and trading ended with an advance for the first time in four days.
abstract: Optimism that Pres Obama and Congressional leaders will reach a deal on the budget deficit helps stocks advance for first time in four days.
lead_paragraph: Encouraging news from government budget talks halted morning losses, and trading ended with an advance for the first time in four days.

headline.seo: Wall Street Climbs on News of Budget Talks
headline.main: Rising Hopes For Budget End Slide On Wall St.
headline.print_headline: Rising Hopes For Budget End Slide On Wall St.
